name: pasteleria-cocina-app
description: Aplicación móvil interna para gestión de pedidos en pastelería

scripts.install:all: npm run frontend:install && npm run backend:install
scripts.android:build:preview: cd frontend && npx eas build --platform android --profile preview
scripts.android:build:production: cd frontend && npx eas build --platform android --profile production
scripts.android:submit: cd frontend && npx eas submit --platform android
scripts.ios:build:preview: cd frontend && npx eas build --platform ios --profile preview
scripts.ios:build:production: cd frontend && npx eas build --platform ios --profile production
scripts.clean: cd frontend && npx expo install --fix && npm run clean-cache
scripts.doctor: cd frontend && npx expo install --fix && npx expo doctor
scripts.android:build:full: npm run android:prep && npm run android:build:production
